title: Docking-based computational analysis of guava (Psidium guajava) leaves derived bioactive compounds as a coagulation factor IXa inhibitor
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25579-25585
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04709E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Joseph G. De Luna, Shanahi Chelledie B. Gonzales, Jimuel Jan M. Nuqui, Evalyn S. Capinding, Corazon D. Sacdalan
This study identifies bioactive compounds from guava leaves that inhibit coagulation factor IXa, highlighting their potential for therapeutic applications in anticoagulant drug development.
